name: New Orleans Barbecued Shrimp
recipeYield: Six appetizer servings or four main-course servings
keywords: appetizer, main course, dairy-free, gluten-free, nut-free, vegetarian, rosemary, shrimp, spices
recipeIngredient: 1 teaspoon African bird pepper or Tabasco sauce
2 pounds medium shrimp, in the shell

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the black pepper, cayenne, African bird pepper or Tabasco sauce, lemon juice, olive oil and rosemary in a large bowl. Add the shrimp and toss to coat well. Cover and refrigerate for 3 hours.
Start a charcoal fire. Grill the shrimp in the shell until they turn bright pink, about 3 minutes per side. Serve as an appetizer or main course.
